planned_area_source: As per copy of gram panchayat plan
area_comments: As per the copy of gram panchayat plan, the planned built-up area is 1,496 sft, whereas the actual built-up area as per sale deed and site measurement is 2,100 sft. There is a deviation of about 40%.
occupancy_comments: Based on the municipal tax receipt and electricity bill, the property is self-occupied by the owner.
construction_comments: The property is fully constructed as per the sale deed and on-site inspection.
market_value_definition: Market Value is defined as 'an opinion of the best price at which the sale of an interest in property would have been completed unconditionally for cash consideration on the date of the valuation, assuming (1) a willing seller; (2) that, prior to the date of valuation, there had been a reasonable period (having regard to the nature of the property and the state of the market) for the proper marketing of the interest and for the agreement of the sale price; (3) that, the state of the market, level of values and other circumstances were, on any earlier assumed date of exchange of contracts, the same as on the date of valuation; (4) that no account is taken of any additional bid by a prospective buyer with a special interest; (5) that both parties to the transaction had acted knowledgeably, prudently and without compulsion.'
documents_description: Sale deed, municipal tax receipt, electricity bill, gram panchayat plan, valuation initiation form
valuer_comments:
• The subject property is a residential independent house situated in Green Villas, Road-5, Ameenpur, Sangareddy District. 
• As per the copy of sale deed, land area is 134 sq yds (1,206 sq ft). 
• Built-up area as per sale deed and site is 2,100 sq ft (Ground + First Floor). 
• There is a deviation from the planned area (1,496 sft as per gram panchayat plan) to actual area (2,100 sft), about 40% more. 
• The property is self-occupied by the owner as confirmed by municipal records. 
• No negative features observed in the immediate surroundings. 
• The property is located within city/municipal limits in a residential neighborhood. 
• No evidence of public nuisance due to projections. 
• The property is approximately 5 years old and in good condition. 
• All information is based on documents provided by HSBC and site inspection.
valuer_declaration: I confirm that the market value for the subject property as on 22 July 2025 is INR NA/- [NA] and the value of amenities as on 22 July 2025 is INR NA/- [NA] taking into consideration the market dynamics and the condition of the property, its location, and amenities available.
disclaimer_text: Please note that the above is a valuation and not a structural survey. CBRE is not responsible to HSBC or the purchaser of the above property for any flaws and/or faults with the property not detected by the above Valuer.
